title: Colormotd插件,只要玩家刷新motd就会刷报错
author: Mr_Des
txt_content:
如题,报错的信息如下,求大触帮忙解决一下~当我在多人游戏界面时,motd会显示检测中,当弹出来的同时就会刷如下报错

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
motd 中用了显示玩家地址的变量？

net.andylizi.colormotdreremake.common.IpAddressManager.getIpInfomations(IpAddressManager.java

replies.author: Mr_Des
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-30 22:18
motd 中用了显示玩家地址的变量？

net.andylizi.colormotdreremake.common.IpAddressManager.getIpInfomat ...
并没有但是用了显示在线人数的变量
还有这是config的配置:
  "tpsFormat": "0.0",
  "usePlaceHolderAPI": true,
  "showPing": false,
  "maintenanceMode": false,
  "emergencyMode": false,
  "requestLimit": 15,
  "ipProvider": "taobao",
  "limitTime": 600000
